sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_N101Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SECU_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , FUND_NM , REG_DT , COM_CD , LONG_ASS_SUM , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #secuNo# , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #datCd# , #busnid# , #tradeNm# , #fundNm# , #regDt# , #comCd# , #longAssSum# , #ddctBsAssAmt# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnAddr# , #revnDt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_N101Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , SECU_NO=#secuNo# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , BUSNID=#busnid# , TRADE_NM=#tradeNm# , FUND_NM=#fundNm# , REG_DT=#regDt# , COM_CD=#comCd# , LONG_ASS_SUM=#longAssSum# , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT=#ddctBsAssAmt# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SECU_NO=#secuNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_N101Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SECU_NO=#secuNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SECU_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , FUND_NM , REG_DT , COM_CD , LONG_ASS_SUM , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT FROM PDF_N101Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SECU_NO=#secuNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SECU_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , FUND_NM , REG_DT , COM_CD , LONG_ASS_SUM , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT FROM PDF_N101Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , SECU_NO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_N101Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
